description: You scratch your head. "Well, I don't think it's a very thick forest." "More of a copse than a forest, really," Alvin offers. "Yes, more of a copse. Anyway, you can see daylight on the other side, so I don't think we'd have to cut through too many to make a passage for the device. On the other hand, it might be smarter to go around. We could set off right away, or we could scout around first."
